stages.name: The Mauryan Empire
stages.description: Explore the rise of India's first great empire under rulers like Chandragupta and Ashoka.

stages.name: The Gupta Empire
stages.description: Discover the 'Golden Age of India,' a period of great scientific and artistic achievement.

stages.name: The Delhi Sultanate
stages.description: Learn about the powerful Turko-Afghan dynasties that ruled from Delhi.

stages.name: Cultural Foundations
stages.description: Master the vibrant festivals, traditional dances, and artistic heritage from across India.

stages.name: Architectural Marvels
stages.description: Identify iconic monuments and learn about the unique art forms that define India's landscape.

stages.name: Living Traditions
stages.description: Test your knowledge on the fascinating facts and fictions that make up India's living traditions.
